segments.text: I see the woman standing there, so focused on polishing that plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I notice the water pouring over the edge of the sink, creating a little waterfall on the cabinet doors.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s almost comical how oblivious she is to the chaos around her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The light filtering through the window gives the whole scene a warm glow, contrasting sharply with the mess below.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children, oh, they're so mischievous, but it’s hard not to root for their cookie heist.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t help but feel a twinge of concern for the boy on that rickety stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: If he falls, it wouldn't just be cookie crumbs flying everywhere; it’s a recipe for disaster!
segments.speaker: PAR
